original_text: Nobody will live in Babylon, because I, the Lord, am very angry with it. It will be only a heap of stones. Everyone who goes that way will see that it is a disgusting place. They will insult Babylon, because of the terrible troubles that have happened to it.’ Nobody will live in Babylon,
korean_text: 여호와의 진노로 말미암아 주민이 없어 완전히 황무지가 될 것이라 바벨론을 지나가는 자마다 그 모든 재난에 놀라며 탄식하리로다

sentences.original_text: because I, the Lord, am very angry with it
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 나 주가 그것에 대해 매우 분노하기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: It will be only a heap of stones
Everyone who goes that way will see
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길로 가는 모든 사람은 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: that it is a disgusting place
because of the terrible troubles that have happened to it
